Paragraph: P3 exhibited the highest PCE value of 5.61% among all polymers , including P1 and P7 , which was attributed to the broad absorption and increased V OC due to the deeper HOMO energy level.

Sure, I'd be happy to help you identify the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph! Here are the entities I found:

2. P1 - This is also a Property Name, as it refers to another specific property of a polymer (in this case, the absorption).
3. P7 - This is a Property Name, as it refers to another specific property of a polymer (in this case, the V OC).
4. PCE - This is an abbreviation for "power conversion efficiency", which is a Property Name.

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: P3 exhibited the highest PCE value of 5.61% among all polymers , including P1 and P7 , which was attributed to the broad absorption and increased V OC due to the deeper HOMO energy level.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. PCE value: This is the value of the Property of "Polymer Composition Index" (PCE) which is a measure of the polymer's thermal stability.
2. P1: This is the name of one of the polymers being compared in the paragraph.
3. P7: This is the name of another polymer being compared in the paragraph.
4. V OC: This stands for "Vapor Organic Carbon" and refers to the amount of organic carbon present in the vapor phase.
5. HOMO energy level: This stands for "HOMO" or "Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital" and refers to the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital in the polymer.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE value (5.61%)
2. P1
3. P7
4. V OC
5. HOMO energy level
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities that refer to the "Value of Material Property" in the given paragraph:

1. PCE value (5.61%) - This is the value of the Property of "Polymer Composition Index" (PCE) which is a measure of the polymer's thermal stability.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the "Value of Material Property", presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE value (5.61%) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
